description: This course is an introduction to speaking, reading, and writing Japanese; writing includes the learning of all syllabic letters (Hiragana and Katakana) and basic Kanji (Chinese characters). Class meets four times weekly. Individual language laboratory visits are also required. Prerequisite: Japanese 111 or equivalent.
name: Beginning Japanese II
notes: Students in Japanese 112 must also register for one lab Japanese 112 AL or BL.
